hi, i have one question, one of our clients its working with HubSpot starter to make a simple PPC Ad campaign and now we discover that in that plan we cant add code to any LP header or footer, making imposible to add fb pixel to our campaign, any of you have some fix to that?
i think that that its a very simple but very important feature that have non sense for us that we cant do it with the starter plan!
